name: A BIG COMPANY
description:
Welcome aboard! You are a new employee at A BIG COMPANY. You may be filling in an open starting position, but that doesn't mean you can't advance! 

As you play through the game you will find out fill in your career log in each room you work in. describe what you do there and how you advanced. Are you a good worker? Someone that advances by force? Blackmail? Have fun with your story!
